org.numenta.nupic.util

Class Coordinator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.util.Coordinator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Topology

    public class Coordinator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Specializes in handling coordinate transforms for N-dimensional integer arrays, between flat and coordinate indexing.
    Author:
    cogmission
    See Also:
    Topology, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Coordinator

        public Coordinator(int[] shape)
        Constructs a new Coordinator object to be configured with specified dimensions and major ordering.
        Parameters:
        shape - the dimensions of this matrix

      • Coordinator

        public Coordinator(int[] shape,
                   boolean useColumnMajorOrdering)
        Constructs a new Coordinator object to be configured with specified dimensions and major ordering.
        Parameters:
        shape - the dimensions of this sparse array
        useColumnMajorOrdering - flag indicating whether to use column ordering or row major ordering. if false (the default), then row major ordering will be used. If true, then column major ordering will be used.

    • Method Detail

      • computeIndex

        public int computeIndex(int[] coordinates)
        Returns a flat index computed from the specified coordinates which represent a "dimensioned" index.
        Parameters:
        coordinates - an array of coordinates
        Returns:
        a flat index

      • computeCoordinates

        public int[] computeCoordinates(int index)
        Returns an array of coordinates calculated from a flat index.
        Parameters:
        index - specified flat index
        Returns:
        a coordinate array

      • initDimensionMultiples

        protected int[] initDimensionMultiples(int[] dimensions)
        Initializes internal helper array which is used for multidimensional index computation.
        Parameters:
        dimensions - matrix dimensions
        Returns:
        array for use in coordinates to flat index computation.

        Returns:
